bibl.title: Πλινθουλκ- vs. πλινθουργ-: Is There Any Difference?
bibl.note: Among the words beginning in πλινθουλκ- / πλινθουργ-, the most common in Ptolemaic Egypt were words in πλινθουλκ-, versus words in πλινθουργ- occurring especially in Roman and Byzantine Egypt.
bibl.seg: WORP K.A., Πλινθουλκ- vs. πλινθουργ-: Is There Any Difference?
Among the words beginning in πλινθουλκ- / πλινθουργ-, the most common in Ptolemaic Egypt were words in πλινθουλκ-, versus words in πλινθουργ- occurring especially in Roman and Byzantine Egypt.
